subject: Order Confirmation
description_text:
Hello,
I recently purchased the control box on Sunday. I haven’t seen any updates
or received an order confirmation yet. It is for Chris Romero, going to
1006 N Murray Blvd Colorado Springs Co. I was just wanting to see if I
could get an update?

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 4020 中
